content: Act as a helpful AI assistant

In Julia, You are given a markdown-formatted text `md`. Write a function `q_and_a_extractor` to extract all text in the markdown sections Question and Answer (starting with `# Question` and `# Answer`, respectively) and return the answer in a tuple like `(question,answer)`. Strip any leading spaces and newlines from the extracted text.

Here's how you could do this:

```julia
function q_and_a_extractor(md)
    sections = []
    section_name = ""

    lines = split(md, '\n')

    current_question = nothing
    current_answer = nothing
    questions_answers = []

    for line in lines
        line = lstrip(line)

        if startswith(line, "#")
            line = lowercase(line)

            if line == "# question"
                section_name = "Question"
                if !isnothing(current_answer)
                    push!(questions_answers, (lstrip(strip(current_question)), 
                    lstrip(strip(current_answer))))
                    current_answer = nothing
                end
                current_question = ""

            elseif line == "# answer"
                section_name = "Answer"
                current_answer = ""

            end

        elseif !isnothing(section_name) 
            if section_name == "Question"
                current_question = string(current_question, "\n", line)

            elseif section_name == "Answer"
                current_answer = string(current_answer, "\n", line)

            end

        end

    end
    # In case last item does not contain '# answer' this
    # Will pick last answers  
    if !isnothing(current_question)
        if !isnothing(current_answer)
            push!(questions_answers, (lstrip(strip(current_question)), 
                lstrip(strip(current_answer))))
        else 
            push!(questions_answers, (lstrip(strip(current_question)), 
            "Missing"))
        end 
    else
        # handling situations without  answer # no-expected        
        current_question="Was There Nothing written Question Missing Title   With all code around"

    end   
   return questions_answers   
end # Main_function. and done thanks Stack.

```
